message.content:
{"id": "7581", 
 "title": "Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet", 
 "description": "From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com> wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com... ", 
 "OB": "The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet. The expected behavior is for the combo box to always match the width of the property sheet column. However, currently it does not. It should function in the same way as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible. It needs further investigation to determine whether the issue lies with our code or with SWT.", 
 "EB": "The ComboBoxCellEditor does not resize correctly in the property sheet. It should always match the width of the property sheet column. Currently, it does not work as expected and needs to be fixed to have the same behavior as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible.", 
 "SR": "1. Investigate the cause of the ComboBoxCellEditor not resizing correctly in the property sheet.\n2. Determine whether the issue is with our code or SWT.\n3. Fix the resizing issue and ensure the ComboBoxCellEditor matches the width of the property sheet column.\n4. Ensure the ComboBoxCellEditor functions in the same way as the DialogCellEditor, with the button always visible."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7581', 'title': 'Bug 7581ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in propery sheet', 'description': 'From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in messagenews:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com... ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'I would have expected behavior where the combo box is always the width of the property sheet column.Note that it should work the same DialogCellEditor (Button always visible)Will need to investigate to determine if this is us or SWT. ', 'SR': ''}
